text: @NYGovCuomo Gov #Cuomo’s words provided comfort around the world.  And we thought, hey, what if they could also help provide equipment to those fighting Covid-19 on the front lines. So we put them on a tee, w/ all profits going to @DirectRelief https://t.co/K6bPgxo7I6

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
